name: .RXE File Extension
summary: Learn about .RXE files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Program written for a Lego Mindstorms NXT robot, a programmable robot developed by LEGO; contains instructions that can be executed by an NXT robot; may control the robot's motors as well as the touch, sound, light, and ultrasonic sensors.

content: The Lego Mindstorms robot line includes the Alpha Rex, Spike, RoboArm, and Tribot.
NOTE: LEGO MINDSTORMS NXT "evolved" into LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3 in 2013.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
